titleStmt.title: A myrrhine posie of the bitter dolovrs of Christ his passion, and of the seaven vvords he spake on the crosse, composed by Ch. M.
titleStmt.author: Kellison, Matthew.

notesStmt.note: By Matthew Kellison. Cf. STC (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: tightly bound with some loss of text.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
